The concept of time dilation in physics would become more apparent and would have practical applications in fields such as travel and communication.
Different cultures would have unique perspectives on time and its importance, leading to a more diverse and nuanced understanding of the concept.
The global economy would be impacted as businesses and industries would have to adjust their operations to accommodate the different time zones.
The social structure of societies would be affected as people would have to adapt to the different time zones and their effects on relationships and daily life.
Scientific research would advance as the study of time dilation would become more sophisticated and lead to new discoveries in physics and other fields.
